pullRequest.title: docs: update docs around column aliasing
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
System generated column aliases are now guaranteed to be unique.
Also raised #5428 while in the file.
Testing done
doc change.
Reviewer checklist

 Ensure docs are updated if necessary. (eg. if a user visible feature is being added or changed).
 Ensure relevant issues are linked (description should include text like "Fixes #")

commit.message:
docs: update docs around column aliasing

System generated column aliases are now guaranteed to be unique.

nodes.bodyText:
I've changed this from:

Push queries enable you to query a materialized view

As that would suggest you can only perform push queries on MVs.... which will suggest tables to most users, while ksqlDB supports push queries on streams too.
